thread.title: WATCH: Roger reveals how he celebrated AO triumph | Tennis | Sporting News
thread.title_full: WATCH: Roger reveals how he celebrated AO triumph | Tennis | Sporting News

author: Sporting News
title: WATCH: Roger reveals how he celebrated AO triumph | Tennis | Sporting News
text:
January 30, 2017 3:59pm EST January 30, 2017 3:18pm EST You wouldn't expect this from Roger. Sporting News 
Published on Jan. 30, 2017 
Jan. 30, 2017 
Roger Federer has revealed that he and his team partied well into the night following his Australian Open triumph over Rafael Nadal on Sunday night. 
MORE: Federer has no intention of retiring 
The now 18-time grand slam champion said that he saw the sunrise over Melbourne on Monday morning, after a long night of celebration and partying. 
“Late, or super early in the morning — I don’t know how you called it,” Federer told the media on Monday. “But, we made it home [at] sunrise which was good." 
And you didn’t think he had it in him, did you? 
Take a look at what Roger had to say about his partying antics in the video player above.
